Both the common Hamming window and Hann window are special cases of the generalized Hamming window with
Number of points in the output window. If zero or less, an empty array is returned.
When True (default), generates a symmetric window, for use in filter design. When False, generates a periodic window, for use in spectral analysis.
The window, with the maximum value normalized to 1 (though the value 1 does not appear if
The Sentinel-1A/B Instrument Processing Facility uses generalized Hamming windows in the processing of spaceborne Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) data . The facility uses various values for the
parameter based on operating mode of the SAR instrument. Some common
values include 0.75, 0.7 and 0.52 . As an example, we plot these different windows.
